main event: A round, silver object the size of a normal plate was sighted making a loud roar before disappearing to the southeast at an altitude of 5,000 feet.
interesting points: The sighting occurred during daylight,The object was observed for a duration of 10 seconds,The initial observation was made in the northwest before the object disappeared in the southeast direction,Comments indicate that the speed was in the range of a meteor unless the object was very low,The report included speculation on the object's classification as possibly being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical.
